property.name: Type
property.value: Star Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Beat Jockey/Red Command Dragon/RexStars

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may reduce this creature's summon cost by 3 and if you have summoned another fire creature this turn, you may summon it for an additional 3 less. If you do, this creature attacks this turn if able, and after it attacks, destroy this creature. {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this card leaves, untap all your creatures and they get "speed attacker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: King Master Card

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-10 Fabulous Art: Duema x TRANSFORMERS

property.name: Race
property.value: Outrage Dragon/Human

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one to your opponent, add it to your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the revealed card is fire or nature, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Revolution 2: If you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets "shield trigger" when added to your hand from your shield zone. ■ Revolution 0: If you have no shields, this creature gets +10000 power, "speed attacker" and "triple breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, choose a number. Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't cast spells that cost the same as that number and your opponent's creatures that cost the same can't attack or block.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command Dragon/Justice Wing/Draguner

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, you may put a dragheart weapon that costs 4 or less that has the same civilization as a card in your mana zone from your hyperspatial zone. (Equip it to this creature.)
